title: Penne Carbonara
ingredients: ['4 eggs, lightly beaten', '450ml (16 fl oz) double cream', '100g (4 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 (500g) packet penne pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '225g (8 oz) sliced pancetta, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '75g (3 oz) pine nuts, toasted', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '50g (2 oz) chopped Italian flat leaf parsley', '50g (2 oz) freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
